About Me

I am and avid juggler and tennis enthusiast. I think both of these hobbies led me to programming. Juggling is very practice based and coding certainly takes a lot of practice. Tennis is in part a game of strategy and each point builds on the previous .

Work

Random-Project-Generator

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,jQuery

Theis app does exactly what it is designed to do. It makes two api calls to generate useful information: a list of random users to help you visualize your end users and a list of public apis based on your chosen subject. You can also edit and save projects using local storage

View Project on GitHub

My-Weather-Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,Bootstrap

This app provides current and forecast weather data from the open weather api. The user is then able to save searched locations in local storage.

View Project on GitHub

git-it-done

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

This app makes a api cals to github's rest api. It provides a way to search for individual github accounts and also groub my most popular coding languages
